name: SE2-17 — GAULETTES MARK
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Anse Gaulettes (Baie Lazare district), Mahé. By the marked stone where roads lean to the sea,
scratch the sign and follow the feather.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.cipher: etching hides letter; coin notch aligns home.
properties.clue:
By the marked stone where roads lean to the sea,
scratch the sign and follow the feather.
properties.visual_description: Roadside stone/marker silhouette (Picault zone); faint skull etch; coin in crack; feather points to bay.
